const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "idx",
  settings: {
    index: {
      mapping: {
        source: {
          mode: "synthetic",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      flattened: {
        type: "flattened",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "idx",
  id: 1,
  document: {
    flattened: {
      field: [
        "apple",
        "apple",
        "banana",
        "avocado",
        "10",
        "200",
        "AVOCADO",
        "Banana",
        "Tangerine",
      ],
    },
  },
});
console.log(response1);
